document_data.name: House Shaelara
document_data.mainbody: '''House Shaelara''' was a [[sun elf]] house on [[Evermeet]].
document_data.History: As of [[1369 DR]], the house was led by [[Uthorim Shaelara]]; most of its members were under a hundred years old. The house arrived on Evermeet from [[Faer√ªn]] around [[1359 DR]] and magically grew a building of grey and white stone in [[Leuthilspar]]. The house was boisterous in comparison to older houses and was noted for frequently causing trouble, especially with [[silver elf|silver elves]].
